channel.title: WvW 101 on Tyrian Misfits
channel.description: Recent content in WvW 101 on Tyrian Misfits

item.title: Commander Calls
item.description: You may hear the commander call out various words and phrases at certain points. Here’s what they mean. Don’t ever hesitate to ask, either in the chat or in Discord, if you have any questions or would like to see new terms added. blast This is usually called right after stealth. It means to use a blast finisher skill inside of a smoke field to create area stealth. See stealth for details.

item.title: Etiquette
item.description: Running with a squad is like a team sport. To be successful, everyone should understand the fundamentals and adhere to certain basic “rules.” These basic rules of etiquette apply to any squad you may find yourself in. Stay on tag. We cannot stress this enough. If you can’t see the tag, you are probably in the wrong place. Trust your commander. Even if the lord is at 5%, if the tag says to follow, do it.

item.title: Builds
item.description: TM does not require specific builds. Play classes you enjoy. That said, there are ideal builds for most classes that fill common roles WvW squads need. If you wish to start exploring those, the best place to start is an up-to-date build website. We recommend GW2Mists. In the Discord there are specific channels dedicated for discussions and questions around specific classes, and occasionally we hold class-specific training sessions. Another site you will hear mentioned a lot is MetaBattle.
